events.message: I ordered a jacket two weeks ago but I want to return it because the size doesn’t fit and I need my money back.
The issue was categorized as a refund request based on the customer’s mention of returning the product and getting money back.
The refund case was assigned to agent Sarah Morgan to handle the return and refund process.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and get a refund. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused with tags attached for us to start the return process?
Sure, my order number is 4589321. The jacket is brand new, I haven’t worn it yet and all tags are still attached.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated the return process for your jacket. Please send it back within 7 days using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Please feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
